type: qs
title: Appendix C Complications or Comorbidities Exclusion list 41.1
description: Appendix C is a list of all of the codes that are defined as either a
  complication or comorbidity (CC) or a major complication or comorbidity (MCC) when
  used as a secondary diagnosis.
